name: Armageddon War:Old Era Wreckers / 大鏖战:旧时代的残党
name_original: Armageddon War:Old Era Wreckers / 大鏖战:旧时代的残党
description:
Game Introduction [/]

This is a turn-based historical warboard game that simulates major battles between 1840 and 1920

Play Mode [/]

The game mainly includes three modes: commander mode, Battle mode, legion mode
In Commander in Chief mode, you play as a commander in chief who controls the military and diplomatic powers of your country, controlling its fate over 150 rounds
The Hegemony mode is a simplified version of the commander in Chief mode, which will be used mainly in imperial campaigns and future historical campaigns
The Legion mode is the simplest version of the game and is used for fast play

Game Content

Contains 8 empires, each empire 5 levels total 40 levels
Four main scripts
Custom Battle mode between 1840 and 1920
Come with script modifier
